attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this website comes in part from the Internet Data Exchange program of MLS NOW. Real estate listings held by brokerage firms other than Zillow, Inc. are marked with the Internet Data Exchange logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing broker(s). Zillow, Inc. does not display the entire MLS NOW IDX database on this website. The listings of some real estate brokerage firms have been excluded. Information is deemed reliable but not guaranteed. Copyright 2023 - Multiple Listing Service, Inc. – All Rights Reserved.

The listing broker’s offer of compensation is made only to participants of the MLS where the listing is filed.

data.description: Welcome to the Reserve of Avon! This stunning colonial boasts plenty of great updates like a newer Trex deck, newer roof, and newer HVAC. Nestled within a park-like development known for its spacious lots and mature trees, this 4-bed, 2.5-bath home offers the perfect blend of tranquility and luxury. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by a foyer open to the dining and living area. The main level features an inviting layout, seamlessly connecting the spacious living room, formal dining area, and a kitchen with sleek countertops, modern appliances, and ample storage space, the kitchen is as functional as it is beautiful. There is also first floor laundry off the garage and a large office off the foyer. Upstairs, you'll find a serene master suite complete with a generously sized walk-in closet and a luxurious en-suite bathroom featuring a spa-like soaking tub and a separate glass-enclosed shower. Three additional bedrooms and a full bathroom provide plenty of space for family and guests. The basement offers some finished space and plenty of wide open space for storage, a workout area or to finish later. Whether entertaining friends on the expansive deck overlooking the lush backyard or enjoying a quiet evening under the stars, this home is a great outdoor retreat. The large lot provides privacy and room to roam, while the tree-lined streets create a serene ambiance that's hard to find elsewhere. Conveniently located near shopping, dining, and recreational opportunities.
